en.profile-not-authorized-message: You need to sign in in order to view your profile
en.register-new-user-message: Enter an email and password to register.
en.sign-in-message: Enter your email and password to sign in.
en.sign-out-message: Are you sure you wish to sign out?
en.register-new-user-complete-message: An email has been sent to the registered address for verification. To complete your account registration click the verification link contained in that email.
